title: Fireseed Trilogy â€” Machine-readable Civilization Framework
description: Fireseed Trilogy is an open civilization-interface framework designed to encode and preserve human knowledge in a machine-readable form. It integrates YAML capsules, IPFS storage, and W3C DID standards for verifiable and interoperable digital legacy preservation.
notes: Zenodo v3.7.8 release including updated capsule schema and bilingual documentation.
